css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-02169d3e-u{box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-8,9,60,88),1);width:calc(33% - 1.25%);flex-basis:calc(33% - 1.25%);min-width:initial;justify-content:flex-end;flex-direction:row;-moz-column-gap:20px;column-gap:20px;}@media only screen and (min-width:1921px){body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-02169d3e-u{-moz-column-gap:28px;column-gap:28px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1366px){body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-02169d3e-u{-moz-column-gap:10px;column-gap:10px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1024px){body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-02169d3e-u{width:calc(30% - 1.25%);flex-basis:calc(30% - 1.25%);}}@media only screen and (max-width:767px){body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-02169d3e-u{width:100%;flex-basis:100%;order:1;justify-content:center;}}
